sentences.en: Thanks to a new directive, food labelling will be more specific.
sentences.cn: 由于官方的一项新指令，食品标签将会更明确具体。

sentences.en: They are seeking a central, directive role in national energy policy.
sentences.cn: 他们正寻求在国家能源政策方面起中心指导作用。

sentences.en: Space Policy Directive-3 lays out general guidelines for the United States to mitigate the effects of space debris and track and manage traffic in space.
sentences.cn: 《空间政策指令3》为美国制定了一般性指南，以减轻空间碎片的影响以及跟踪和管理太空交通。
